# This file is automatically generated by the TouchGFX Designer. Do not modify.
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.22)

# TouchGFX generated symbols
set(TouchGFX_Defines_Syms
    USE_BPP=16
)

# TouchGFX generated include paths
set(TouchGFX_Include_Dirs
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/Middlewares/ST/touchgfx/framework/include
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/TouchGFX/generated/fonts/include
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/TouchGFX/generated/gui_generated/include
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/TouchGFX/generated/images/include
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/TouchGFX/generated/texts/include
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/TouchGFX/generated/videos/include
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/TouchGFX/gui/include
)

# TouchGFX generated application sources
set(TouchGFX_Src
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/TouchGFX/gui/src/common/FrontendApplication.cpp
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/TouchGFX/gui/src/model/Model.cpp
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/TouchGFX/gui/src/screen1_screen/Screen1Presenter.cpp
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/TouchGFX/gui/src/screen1_screen/Screen1View.cpp
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/TouchGFX/generated/fonts/src/ApplicationFontProvider.cpp
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/TouchGFX/generated/fonts/src/CachedFont.cpp
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/TouchGFX/generated/fonts/src/CompressedFontCache.cpp
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/TouchGFX/generated/fonts/src/CompressedUnmappedFontCache.cpp
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/TouchGFX/generated/fonts/src/FontCache.cpp
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/TouchGFX/generated/fonts/src/Font_verdana_10_4bpp_0.cpp
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/TouchGFX/generated/fonts/src/Font_verdana_20_4bpp_0.cpp
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/TouchGFX/generated/fonts/src/Font_verdana_40_4bpp_0.cpp
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/TouchGFX/generated/fonts/src/GeneratedFont.cpp
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/TouchGFX/generated/fonts/src/Kerning_verdana_10_4bpp.cpp
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/TouchGFX/generated/fonts/src/Kerning_verdana_20_4bpp.cpp
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/TouchGFX/generated/fonts/src/Kerning_verdana_40_4bpp.cpp
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/TouchGFX/generated/fonts/src/Table_verdana_10_4bpp.cpp
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/TouchGFX/generated/fonts/src/Table_verdana_20_4bpp.cpp
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/TouchGFX/generated/fonts/src/Table_verdana_40_4bpp.cpp
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/TouchGFX/generated/fonts/src/UnmappedDataFont.cpp
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/TouchGFX/generated/fonts/src/VectorFontRendererBuffers.cpp
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/TouchGFX/generated/gui_generated/src/common/FrontendApplicationBase.cpp
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/TouchGFX/generated/gui_generated/src/screen1_screen/Screen1ViewBase.cpp
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/TouchGFX/generated/images/src/BitmapDatabase.cpp
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/TouchGFX/generated/images/src/SVGDatabase.cpp
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/TouchGFX/generated/images/src/__generated/image_alternate_theme_images_backgrounds_800x480_gradient_dark.cpp
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/TouchGFX/generated/images/src/__generated/image_alternate_theme_images_widgets_togglebutton_medium_rounded_off_light.cpp
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/TouchGFX/generated/images/src/__generated/image_alternate_theme_images_widgets_togglebutton_medium_rounded_on_normal.cpp
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/TouchGFX/generated/texts/src/LanguageGb.cpp
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/TouchGFX/generated/texts/src/Texts.cpp
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/TouchGFX/generated/texts/src/TypedTextDatabase.cpp
)

# Add generated touchgfx includes to interface library
target_include_directories(stm32cubemx INTERFACE ${TouchGFX_Include_Dirs})
target_compile_definitions(stm32cubemx INTERFACE ${TouchGFX_Defines_Syms})

# Create TouchGFX library
add_library(TouchGFX OBJECT)
target_sources(TouchGFX PRIVATE ${TouchGFX_Src})
target_link_libraries(TouchGFX PUBLIC stm32cubemx)

# Check floating point options
if(CMAKE_C_FLAGS MATCHES "-mfloat-abi=hard")
    set(HARD_FLOAT "-float-abi-hard")
else()
    set(HARD_FLOAT "")
endif()

# Link touchgfx (and nemagfx) static libs
target_link_libraries(TouchGFX PRIVATE
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/Middlewares/ST/touchgfx/lib/core/cortex_m4f/gcc/libtouchgfx${HARD_FLOAT}.a
)

# Link video(s)
target_link_libraries(TouchGFX PRIVATE
)

# Add TouchGFX to project executable
target_link_libraries(${CMAKE_PROJECT_NAME} TouchGFX)
